locations.name: Front Campus
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 1

You wake up on Front Campus, the historic heart of the University of Toronto. University College stands nearby, and students hurry past on their way to class. You suddenly realize you're missing important items!

Your goal: find your USB drive, laptop charger, and lucky mug, then DEPOSIT them at Oak House (Location 15) before 1pm.

IMPORTANT: You can only carry 2 items at a time.

You can DROP items anywhere, but DEPOSIT only counts at Oak House.

You can go east or south.

locations.name: University College
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 2

You are walking past University College, one of the oldest buildings on campus. Its Romanesque architecture towers above you. A construction wall blocks the eastern path.

You can go west back to Front Campus or south.

locations.name: Second Cup
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 4

You are inside Second Cup. The smell of coffee fills the air, and students are typing furiously on laptops. On a nearby table, you spot your T-card and your lucky mug!

Remember:
- You can only carry 2 items.
- DROP items here temporarily.
- DEPOSIT only matters at Oak House.

You can go south or west.

locations.name: McLennan Physical Laboratories
locations.brief_description: You are outside McLennan Physical Laboratories.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 5

You are standing outside McLennan Physical Laboratories, a concrete physics building known for its quiet atmosphere. Footsteps echo through the narrow walkways. A wall blocks the path to the east.

You can go north toward Front Campus or south.

locations.name: Woodsworth College
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 8

You are walking through Woodsworth College, a commuter-focused college with quiet hallways and study spaces. Bulletin boards advertise academic advising and campus events.

You can go north to Second Cup, south, or west toward McLennan Physical Laboratories.

locations.name: Trinity College
locations.brief_description: You are in Trinity College courtyard.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 9

You stand in the courtyard of Trinity College. Gothic stone buildings surround you, and the atmosphere is calm and academic. A fountain trickles quietly nearby.

You can go north toward McLennan Physical Laboratories, east, or south toward Robarts Library.

locations.name: New College
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 10

You are walking past New College. The area feels open and modern, with green spaces and students relaxing between classes.

You can go west, east, or south.

locations.name: Bahen Centre for Information Technology
locations.brief_description: You are at the Bahen Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 11

You are inside the Bahen Centre for Information Technology. You were coding here yesterday. Your USB drive sits on a desk, and your laptop charger is plugged into the wall.

Remember: You can only carry 2 items.

You can go west, east, or south.

locations.name: Earth Sciences Centre
locations.brief_description: You are at the Earth Sciences Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 12

You are near the Earth Sciences Centre. Glass walls reveal students studying geology and environmental science.

You can go west, north, or south.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 13

You stand at the entrance of Robarts Library, its massive brutalist structure looming overhead.

ENTRANCE REQUIREMENT: You must have your T-card in your inventory to enter.

Inside, you notice a Dorm Key left on a study desk.

You can go north or east.

locations.name: Sidney Smith Hall
locations.brief_description: You are near Sidney Smith Hall.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 14

You are standing near Sidney Smith Hall, a major humanities building. Students pass by discussing essays and lectures.

You can go north, west, or east.

locations.name: Oak House Residence
locations.brief_description: You are at Oak House Residence.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 15

You arrive at Oak House Residence â€” your FINAL DESTINATION.

ENTRANCE REQUIREMENT: You must have the Dorm Key in your inventory.

TO WIN: DEPOSIT all three required items here:
1. USB Drive
2. Laptop Charger
3. Lucky Mug

DROP leaves items temporarily.
DEPOSIT permanently delivers items and earns points.

You can go west, east, or north.

locations.name: Athletic Centre
locations.brief_description: You are at the Athletic Centre.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 16

You are at the Athletic Centre. The sounds of basketballs bouncing and people cheering echo from inside.

You can go west or north.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A silver USB drive with all your project files.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Your laptop charger. Your battery is almost dead.

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: Your lucky U of T mug.

items.name: T-card
items.description: Your student ID card. Required to enter Robarts Library.

items.name: Dorm Key
items.description: A key to Oak House residence.
